room_title: Escape room "Wrongfully Accused" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: What a great experience, we tried the Wrongfully Accused room. This was our first time and we almost got out. Staff was friendly and made it an awesome experience. We are definitely going back to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Wrongfully Accused" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: The jail escape was so much fun! We can't wait to go back and try another one. It makes you think and it's a unique experience I would definitely recommend this!

room_title: Escape room "Wrongfully Accused" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: Awesome game! Definitely recommend this if you like puzzles and problem solving. Kudos to the creator!

room_title: Escape room "Wrongfully Accused" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: Great customer service and fun, challenging escapes. We went in to try one and ended up staying to do another. The rooms were set up well and we would definitely recommend this place.

room_title: Escape room "Wrongfully Accused" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: This is our second escape room here in Vegas and we really enjoyed this one. Bret did a great job with the room set up and the clues. We will definitely be back to try the other two rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Wrongfully Accused" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: So much fun! I did the wrongfully accused room and it was amazing! It was a pretty good brain teaser. Will definitely be back to do the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Wrongfully Accused" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: Live Escape Adventure of Las Vegas is a fun, challenging, and unique experience. It is something that you will have a blast doing. Your brain will be challenged and you will have to think on your feet, but you will definitely not be disappointed. My friend and I tried "Wrongfully Accused" and loved it. We can't wait to go back to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Wrongfully Accused" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in Las Vegas
review: Amazingly fun!! The rooms are so clever! Bret is awesome.  I am still smiling at how great it felt to work as a team and use our brains!  Can't wait to go back and take family when they come to town. I told all my friends and coworkers about the great fun we had. We did "Wrongfully Accused" and looking forward to trying other rooms.
